name: Blackagar Boltagon
text: Setup: Place 2 electron counters on Blackagar Boltagon. Drawing In Strength — Action: Draw a card. Place electron counters on Blackagar Boltagon equal to the number of [mental] resources on that card. (Limit once per round.)

name: Black Bolt
text: Particle Channeling — Action: Discard a card from your hand → place electron counters on Black Bolt equal to the number of printed [mental] resources on that card. (Limit once per round.)

name: Lockjaw
text: Interrupt: When Lockjaw is defeated, remove 2 electron counters from Black Bolt → return Lockjaw to your hand. “He is my oldest friend in the world -- closer to me than my family, truer to me than my brother.” -- Black Bolt

name: Strength of a King
text: Max 1 per round. Hero Action: Remove 1 electron counter from Black Bolt → until the end of the round, Black Bolt gets +2 ATK.

name: Energy Beam
text: Hero Action (attack): Remove 2 electron counters from Black Bolt → deal 6 damage to an enemy. This attack gains overkill and piercing.

name: Aerial Dodge
text: Hero Interrupt (defense): When you would take any amount of damage, prevent 2 of that damage (4 of that damage instead if you have the AERIAL trait). If you took no damage, place 1 electron counter on Black Bolt.

name: Silent Schemes
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove X electron counters from Black Bolt → remove 3 threat from X schemes. “You are about to see a most wonderful, carefully-orchestrated plan come to its fruition.” - Karnak

name: Royal Antenna
text: Alter-Ego Action: Take up to 3 damage and exhaust Royal Antenna → place 1 electron counter on Blackagar Boltagon for each damage you took.

name: Anti-Graviton Field
text: Black Bolt gains the AERIAL trait. Hero Action: Remove 1 electron counter from Black Bolt and exhaust Anti-Graviton Field → ready Black Bolt.

name: Inhuman Throne
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Inhuman Throne → shuffle a Black Bolt card from your discard pile into your deck.

name: Commanding Voice
text: Hero Action (attack): Choose a player and remove 4 electron counters from Black Bolt → deal 10 damage to the villain and each enemy engaged with that player. “War.”
